cast.name: 托维诺·托马斯 Tovino Thomas

writer.name: 比朱·达莫达兰 Bijukumar Damodaran

director.name: 比朱·达莫达兰 Bijukumar Damodaran

introduction: What happens when a window opens to the other side and we are suddenly involved in a story about love, war and loss? A man with serious problems becomes witness to a pending destruction that may affect all but can still find a place for tenderness and think about our future. One of the most surprising examples of modern Indian Cinema, coming from one of its most respected voices, the director of “Painted Life”, awarded in Fantasporto 2018. This film has in the lead the super-star Tovino Thomas and a score by the three-time Grammy winner, Ricky Kej.源自：https://fantasporto.com/en/invisible-windows/
